name: Massacre
description: Massacre is a long-range Support Machine Gun title focused on accuracy and recoil reduction. The combination lets you land mixed critical and body shots at distance, and with a scope a Massacre can pick off targets normally reserved for sniper rifles.
notes: Torgue and Vladof cannot manufacture Massacres because their best Support Machine Guns top out around 88.3 and 88.5 accuracy. The Massacre title (Accuracy1_Massacre) is awarded to high-accuracy Support Machine Guns and further improves recoil reduction.
